ComicInfo.Summary:
Atalon kidnaps Ghoul so that he can communicate with the founds of the Fire People, who are long dead. Atalon forces Ghoul to concentrate and to Ghoul's surprise, he makes contact. While they learn the history of the Fire People, Ultraforce tries to quell the anxiety of the public, who feel that ultras are to blame for the world's latest conflict. Ultraforce goes to the headquarters that the government has created for them to devise a plan to defeat Atalon. Contrary is able to formulate a plan that calls for Pixx to manually dismantle all the warheads while the rest of Ultraforce take the fight to Atalon directly. Meanwhile, Atalon starts his own plan of conquering the world.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-22 22:05:15. [Issue ID 102494]
